decisions.description: Was the contact found at the account or not
decisions.name: dec_whereContactIsFound_0
decisions.label: Contact Found?

decisions.description: Is the account provided before lead conversion button clicked?
decisions.name: desAccount_Provided
decisions.label: desAccountProvided

decisions.description: Update many values on opportunity if the lead source is internal lead.
decisions.name: LeadSource
decisions.label: Lead Source

Flow.description: New version with BU as a picklist field. Option 1 Match found at same account - DO NOT SHOW Option 2 Matches found at different account based on name or email Option 3 Other people found at same account. Option 4 one match found at different account. Option 5 no contacts found at the same account. Two subflows

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Get all contacts at the account into a collection choice set
dynamicChoiceSets.name: chsCollectionContacts

formulas.description: This formula is used to determine if the lead source is internal. If it is, then opportunity creation will default to yes.
formulas.name: frm_defaultOpportunity

formulas.description: Set the opportunity stage to 1 - Possibility for Internal Leads
formulas.name: frm_oppStage
frmAccountFound
formulas.expression: IF({!Lead.Account__c}="" && {!varFoundAccountId}="","No account found matching " + {!Lead.Company}+". Search for it here.", IF({!varFoundAccountId}!="", "Is this the correct account?",""))

formulas.name: frmCreatedItems
formulas.expression:
IF(OR({!booCreateNewContact}=true,{!varNewOpportunity}!=''),
'We created ' + IF({!booCreateNewContact}=true, ' a contact ','') + IF(AND({!booCreateNewContact}=true, {!varNewOpportunity}!='') , ' and ' ,'') + IF({!varNewOpportunity}!='', 'an Opportunity','') + ' for you. Click Next to open the ' + IF({!varNewOpportunity}!='', 'Opportunity.','Contact.'), 'You chose not to create any new record. Click Next to continue to the Contact you merged into.')

formulas.description: remove double quotes from description because it breaks in Share Point if there are double quotes.
formulas.name: frmLeadDescriptionQuotes

formulas.description: if the lead owner is inactive, assign current user. otherwise, use owner of the lead.
formulas.name: frmOwnerId

Flow.label: ScreenFlow Lead Conversion 1/3

recordCreates.description: change to find AccountId from varFoundAccountId instead of from Lead record.
recordCreates.name: Create_New_Contact1
recordCreates.label: Create Contact

recordLookups.description: People matching by email, name or account.
recordLookups.name: ContactsAtOtherAccounts
recordLookups.label: Contacts At Other Account

recordLookups.description: Look up account based on the company name field on the lead.
recordLookups.name: Get_Account
recordLookups.label: Get Account

recordLookups.description: See if owner is currently active. If they are not, then we need a different owner. If the owner is Temp Owner, we also need a different owner. the ownerId if found here is assigned to VarActiveOwner. Using a formula, the owner is assigned to current user if varactiveOwner is empty.
recordLookups.name: Get_Owner
recordLookups.label: Get Owner

recordLookups.description: Get contacts only from the account.
recordLookups.name: GetContactAtThisAccount
recordLookups.label: Contact At this Account

recordLookups.description: get contacts to include in record choice set.
recordLookups.name: getOtherContactsAtAccount
recordLookups.label: XXXXgetOtherContactsAtAccount

recordUpdates.description: The apex is not correctly setting the contact owner so we will set it here.
recordUpdates.name: upd_ContactOwner
recordUpdates.label: updateContactOwner

recordUpdates.description: If they looked up an account in the flow, update the lead's Account so the conversion process will work.
recordUpdates.name: Update_LeadAccount
recordUpdates.label: Update Lead Account

recordUpdates.description: Update the opportunity uses values from the assignment.
recordUpdates.name: UpdateOpp_0
recordUpdates.label: Update Opportunity

fields.name: dsp_CreateOppConfirm
fields.fieldText: Are you sure do not want an opportunity on this internal lead? Click "No, go back" to change your choice.

fields.name: errMsgApex
fields.fieldText:
Sorry, something went wrong during creation of Account or Opportunity.

System adminisntrator has been alerted.

Error message:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

screens.description: The user can look up the account or confirm that the flow found the correct one.
screens.name: FindMatchingAccount
screens.label: Find Matching Account

fields.name: dsp_createOppconfirmtext
fields.fieldText: Are you sure do not want an opportunity on this internal lead?

textTemplates.name: textTempUrlToServiceNow
textTemplates.text: If no matching Account can be found, go here to create a new Account in ServiceNow.

variables.description: collection of contacts found at other accounts. This goes into a grid.
variables.name: coll_OtherAccts

variables.description: Opportunity to update at the end
variables.name: recOppVar

variables.description: this is the Lead that is being converted. value passed in from the lead conversion button.
variables.name: recordId

variables.description: If variable is null, the owner is not active and we need a new owner for the converted records.
variables.name: varActiveOwner

variables.description: Display this text on the Create New Contact and or opportunity screen. Set in assignment with text template. Also takes input from Same Account sublfow
variables.name: varDisplayTextForNewContact

variables.description: 1 Match found at same account 2 Multiple Matches found at different account based on name or email 3 Other people found at same account. 4 One match found at different account 5 no matches anywhere, and no contacts found at same account.
variables.name: varSCENARIO
